name: Cursor Lucullus

topics.response_text: {Shocked}I warned them about that truck weeks ago. Always be prepared for any hazardous radiation I said.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to travel with you.
topics.response_text: The trip will take a few hours. Take your place on the boat.
You'll be meeting face-to-face with the mighty{KAI-zar}Caesar himself, founder of the Legion, conquerer of 86 tribes.
I am Cursor{Luh-CULL-us}Lucullus, and my orders are to escort you to the Legion's camp at Fortification Hill. Are you ready to go?
The guard in the weather station will return the Chip to you when you're ready for{KAI-zar's}Caesar's mission. Otherwise, we can return to Cottonwood Cove.
All who are not Legion are "Dissolute." They live in squalor, unrestrained by morality, lacking moderation, temper, and self-control.

topics.topic_text: What have I done to earn this honor?
topics.response_text: You'd know better than I would. But you must be remarkable, for{KAI-zar}Caesar to take such an interest.
{WALL-ae}Vale, as you wish. My orders are to wait here until you're ready to make the trip.

topics.topic_text: Why are you surprised to see a woman receive this honor?
topics.response_text: {a ridiculous question, but it's your duty to be polite}Women are physically and intellectually inferior to men. Their role is to bear children and ensure the survival of our species.

topics.topic_text: I'm ready to return to Cottonwood Cove.

description:
Cursor Lucullus is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

Cursor Lucullus is a ferryman for Caesar's Legion who operates on the Colorado River, transporting Legion members and allies between Cottonwood Cove and Fortification Hill. Standing noticeably taller than the average legionary, Lucullus serves as a vital link in the Legion's supply chain across the river. His weathered appearance and calloused hands speak of years navigating the treacherous waters of the Mojave.

Cursor Lucullus's Personality: Lucullus is stoic and disciplined, reflecting the values instilled by Caesar's Legion. He is efficient in his duties, showing little emotion but possessing a quiet determination. He respects the Legion's hierarchy and carries out his orders without question, though those who observe closely might notice a hint of weariness in his eyes, suggesting he may not be entirely committed to the Legion's cause.

Cursor Lucullus's Backstory: Born in the ruins of a pre-War city in the former Arizona territory, Lucullus survived his early years through resilience and adaptability. He was eventually found by scouts from Caesar's Legion and impressed them with his knowledge of the river systems and his ability to navigate treacherous waters. Recognizing his value, the Legion trained him as a cursor (courier) specializing in river transport. Over the years, he has become one of the most reliable ferrymen in the Legion, trusted to transport personnel, supplies, and even sensitive messages between their outposts.
